rationale: No intensifier or comparative directly modifies a risk-adjective.
The segment describes location using neutral language.
"were at" is not a moderate verb.
The segment reports latest case locations but contains no explicit calming language.
Segment does not contain a minimiser + scale contrast.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes location of cases, not capability or preparedness.
The segment reports location and type of cases, not prices/metrics.
The segment reports case locations, not speculation about relief.
No direct quote or attributed statement providing a dominant frame.
Factual reporting of case locations and types of flocks without explicit framing cues.
